name: Ping Pong
description: Use your hands to control the paddles and keep the ball in play as long as possible. Test your agility, focus and hand-eye coordination.

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Measured by how quickly the player repositions their paddle

skills.name: Focus
skills.description: Measured by duration of continuous gameplay without missing

skills.name: Hand-Eye Coordination
skills.description: Measured by successfully hitting the ball at various speeds

skills.name: Reaction Time
skills.description: Measured by successful hits when ball changes direction quickly
